@graph.description: Every customer has different needs. Businesses have different opening times and closing times. Also, some people may only want your field employees to visit them in the morning, while others may prefer the afternoon or evening hours. When you plan your routes by hand, trying to hit all those time windows is confusing. It can take a long time to figure out, and you might make a mistake and accidentally send your field employee to a customer when they're not available, which would upset the customer and damage your reputation. That's why you should use Route4Me instead of planning your routes manually. With Route4Me, all you need to do is plug in the times that each customer is available, and then our platform does the hard work for you. You'll have the routes you need to visit your customers during their available times in the most efficient way possible.
